attributes.action: The UK must leave the EU by the 31st October 2019 with or without a deal.
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister David Cameron stated in the Leaflet sent to homes in the UK that if we voted to leave the European Union in the Referendum that the result would be honoured & we would leave both the Single Market & the Customs Union.
attributes.background: In the Referendum of 2016 the people of the United Kingdom voted to leave the European Union by a majority.
